data.question: What is the empirical formula of NU-1500-Fe?

How does the water working capacity of NU-1500-Cr compare between a RH range of 40-60% and 10-90%?
data.answer: The water working capacity at a RH range of 40-60% is 0.84 g g-1, and at a RH range of 10-90% it is 1.91 g g-1.
